name: The Sound of Souls
description:
Repair the sounds around you. Re-pair relationships that are meant to be ❤ 

Controls:
Move:
- Controller: Analog Stick
- Keyboard: WASD or Arrow Keys

Grab the creatures: 
- Controller: Any button you might want 
- Keyboard: Space, Enter or E
